DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety effectiveness MicroVention Flow Redirection Intraluminal Device ( FRED ) system use treatment wide-necked intracranial aneurysm .
DOC.brief_title: Pivotal Study FRED Stent System Treatment Intracranial Aneurysms
DOC.criteria: Subject whose age≥ 22and ≤75 year Subject single target aneurysm locate internal carotid artery Subject fulfill study requirement his/her legally authorize representative provide sign informed consent form Subject suffer intracranial hemorrhage last 30 day Subject suffers subarachnoid hemorrhage last 60 day Subject symptomatic extracranial mass currently undergo radiation therapy tumor head nexk region Subject pregnant breastfeeding Subject arteriovenous malformation ( AVM ) area target aneurysm
